name: Space Harvest (itch)
description:
The aim of the game is to collect the energy capsules that appear (and a short time later disappear) on the screen . This energy capsules give energy to our spaceship   for moving and on the other hand we also get the money for the collected energy capsules.

The game is complicated by randomly appearing anti-material (“black matter”) which, if touched by spaceship, leads to the immediate destruction.

Control:

movement: W-S-A-D

self destrucion: Q

 

Credit:  engine: Playcanvas

                assets: www.Kenney.nl
